content: looking for a fun quick and easy project that s both adorable and practical this crochet bear keychain pattern is just the thing you need to add a little charm to your day **materials** ▢red heart yarn - aran ▢red heart yarn - cafe latte ▢red heart yarn - black ▢polyfill ▢10 mm safety eyes ▢4 5 mm hook ▢keychain ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease
